## Setup

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```

## Import 

Same process as before

```{r}
snyder <- read_excel("data-raw/SnyderCity.xls")

snyder |> glimpse()
```

## Clean

```{r}
snyder_clean <- snyder |> mutate(
  datetime_arrest = mdy_hm(datetime_arrest)
)
snyder_clean
```

## Export 

```{r}
snyder_clean |> write_rds("data-processed/Snyder-City.rds")
```
